question: Your development team has created a mobile game app. You want to test the new mobile app on Android and iOS devices with a variety of configurations. You need to ensure that testing is efficient and cost-effective. What should you do?

options.text: Upload your mobile app to the Firebase Test Lab, and test the mobile app on Android and iOS devices.
Create Android and iOS VMs on Google Cloud, install the mobile app on the VMs, and test the mobile app.
Create Android and iOS containers on Google Kubernetes Engine (GKE), install the mobile app on the containers, and test the mobile app.
Upload your mobile app with different configurations to Firebase Hosting and test each configuration.
